title: Pinging glitch PLS HELP
body: ever since i updated to the most recent patch, when i ping a enemy or a tower, their sums or even their character, it just clumps together as shown in the screenshot. Ive tried closing and reopening and it doesnt seem to fix it. any help please?

replies.body: Psst. I got this error too. Gonna try the instructions in the thread, just figured I'd let you guys know in case it's a different problem. :D
any chance youre a mac user? my friend who is also a mac user is dealing with the same issue

That's really strange!  There could be a corruption in your settings.  See if a config reset might fix this up, and let me know!

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.
and removing these files wont harm my game in any way right?
On the contrary, resetting your config would reset your settings to default so it would remove anything that could actually be causing harm.
ok so i removed those two files you named above and for 2 games my pings were fine but then it started happening again. Should i just repair my client?

SO it fixed for a bit then came back?  Very weird!  Sure, download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) in case you need to reinstall, otherwise a repair might help.  I do recommend sticking to custom games for now, though!
